title: Hour 2: Down Hill?
description:
In this episode, Courtney Cronin, Bart Scott, and Chris "Mad Dog" Russo return to discuss the state of the Kansas City Chiefs after Tyreek Hill was dealt to Miami this offseason. Speaking of Hill, he joins the show to give us some insight into his decision to leave Patrick Mahomes and why he's looking forward to working with Tua Tagovailoa. David Ortiz has officially been inducted into the Baseball Hall of Fame, but what does this mean for Barry Bonds and Roger Clemens? Courtney and our own hall of famer Chris Russo go head to head in a Hall of Fame debate. Plus, which QB will have a bigger Sophomore year? The crew talks about what they expect for the futures of Trey Lance, Zach Wilson, Trevor Lawrence and more. Unsurprisingly, Draymond Green is giving hot takes on Twitter and taking shots at the 1998 Chicago Bulls. Very surprisingly, Mad Dog agrees with him!
